alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 9:03PM CDT until June 10 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR CARSON...SOUTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON...GRAY AND SOUTHWESTERN ROBERTS COUNTIES... At 903 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Pampa to 4 miles south of Skellytown to 5 miles east of Panhandle, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Borger, Panhandle, White Deer, Groom, Lefors, Skellytown, Lake Mcclellan and Kingsmill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
